sentence.Network_en: It was unbelievably dramatic as lightning crackled all round the van.
sentence.Network_cn: 闪电在货车周围炸开时，情景异常壮观。

sentence.Network_en: Most unbelievably of all, it only has three moving parts!
sentence.Network_cn: 最令人难以置信的是，它只有3个活动部件！

sentence.Network_en: Unbelievably, our Government are now planning to close this magnificent institution.
sentence.Network_cn: 让人匪夷所思的是，我们的政府竟然在计划关掉这个出色的机构。

disbel... ... unbelievable adj. 难以置信的 unbelievably adv. 难以置信地,不可信地 unbeliever n. 不轻信者, 不信仰者, 异教徒.
the band loan rate is unbelievably high ., 银行贷款利率高得太离谱.

list.abs: The Garden of everything... ... Deep azure 深邃蔚蓝的瞳孔 Quite unbelievable 巧夺天工 You''ve been made 你就像阳光的女儿.
in the congregation of sinners a fire shall be kindled an unbelieving nation wrath shall dame out .烈火在罪人的集会中燃烧，义怒向背信的民族怒吼。
She had lived through 72 almost unbelievable hours under the rubble ., 她几乎难以置信地在瓦砾当中存活了 72 小时.
She stared at me with unbelieving eyes ., 她以怀疑的眼光注视着我.

entry.tran: 不可思议的；难以置信的；极好的；非常棒的
entry.def: If you say that something is unbelievable, you are emphasizing that it is very good, impressive, intense, or extreme.

example.ex: His guitar solos are just unbelievable...
The pressure they put us under was unbelievable...
example.tran: 他们给我们施加的压力之大超乎想象。

entry.tran: 极其糟糕的；令人震惊的；令人无法相信的
entry.def: You can use unbelievable to emphasize that you think something is very bad or shocking.

example.ex: I find it unbelievable that people can accept this sort of behaviour...
example.tran: 人们竟能接受这样的行为，我震惊不已。

example.ex: Yes, the music library burned, three or four double basses burned. It's just unbelievable.
example.tran: 是的，音乐图书馆被烧了，三四把低音提琴烧毁了。真是太不幸了。

entry.def: If an idea or statement is unbelievable, it seems so unlikely to be true that you cannot believe it.

example.ex: I still find this story both fascinating and unbelievable...
example.tran: 我仍觉得这个故事既有趣又不太可信。

example.ex: I know it sounds unbelievable but I never wanted to cheat.
example.tran: 我知道听上去难以置信，但我从不想撒谎。

sentences.sentence: "behind you the coastal hills plunge to the incredibly blue sea backed by the Turkish mountains"

auth_sentence.content: She was an unbelievably good sport to do that.

auth_sentence.content: The whole issue was almost unbelievably meaningless and small.

sentences.cn: 他们无知到令人难以置信的地步。
